tool_description: Manages payment terms, due dates, and payment instructions based on customer agreements and company policies for clear payment expectations.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for payment terms lookup

invoice_date.description: Invoice date for due date calculation

payment_terms_override.description: Override default payment terms (Net 15, Net 30, Net 60, Due on Receipt)

error_messages: Customer payment terms not found: No payment terms defined for this customer. Set up customer payment terms or use override.
Invalid payment terms: Payment terms format is not recognized. Use standard terms like Net 30, Net 15, or Due on Receipt.
Invalid invoice date: Invoice date format is incorrect or date is in the future. Provide a valid current or past date.
usage: Provide customer_id and invoice_date to retrieve payment terms and calculate due date. Optionally use payment_terms_override to specify different terms for this invoice.

payment_terms.description: Payment terms applied to this invoice

payment_instructions.description: Payment instructions and methods available to customer

early_payment_terms.description: Early payment discount terms if applicable
